page.title: 19MOBILITY OF POPULATION
page.content: About half of the children in our school have lived in Earley all their lives and a further 18% have only moved locally. We have equal numbers moving from southern England and other parts of the country. 5% of our pupils have moved several times and a further 5% have moved from abroad. Most of the children coming to this country have professional parents and moved because of their father's work. A few are normally resident abroad but came because of parents connections with The University or local business. {SCHOOL TRAVEL (Earley St.Peter's) } About 2/3 come to school by car, just under 1/3 walk and the rest cycle.This is because some people live too far away from the school to walk and public transport isnt very convenient. Some children walk part of the way.Not many cycle because traffic is heavy.
